metadata.title: VIRUSOLOGY Structural Organization of the Genome of SARS-Associated Coronavirus (Strain SoD) Isolated on the Territory of the Russian Federation

abstract.original_text: Complete nucleotide cDNA sequence (29715 nucleotides) of SARS-associated coronavirus (strain SoD) isolated for the first time in the territory of the Russian Federation was determined. Phylogenetic analysis revealed maximum similarity between strain SoD genome and Frankfurt 1 strain genome. Three nucleotide substitutions determining two amino acid substitutions were detected.

sentences.segment_text: Complete nucleotide cDNA sequence ( 29715 nucleotides ) of SARS-associated coronavirus ( strain SoD ) isolated for the first time in the territory of the Russian Federation was determined .
Phylogenetic analysis revealed maximum similarity between strain SoD genome and Frankfurt 1 strain genome .
Three nucleotide substitutions determining two amino acid substitutions were detected .
